info.name: E-Kerja Backend API Testing - Complete with New Features REQ-B-2.4/2.5/5.4/5.5/7.4/7.5/8.4
info.description:
Koleksi testing lengkap untuk semua requirement backend API E-Kerja:
- REQ-B-1 to REQ-B-12: Core platform functionality
- REQ-B-13: Statistics APIs for dashboard insights
- REQ-B-14: Order status tracking and management
- REQ-B-15: Email verification system with 2-way verification
- NEW FEATURES:
  • REQ-B-2.4: Encrypted filename storage for file uploads
  • REQ-B-2.5: Unique filename generation and validation
  • REQ-B-5.4: Provider attendance status tracking at location
  • REQ-B-5.5: Customer verification of provider data
  • REQ-B-7.2: Auto-hide reviews when reported (C-10 compliance)
  • REQ-B-7.4: Customer edit review functionality
  • REQ-B-7.5: Admin access to hidden reviews
  • REQ-B-8.4: Customer-generated admin chat access
  • REQ-B-15.3: Email verification for order status changes

Features:
✅ Bearer Token Authentication
✅ Encrypted File Upload with Unique Names
✅ Provider Location Attendance Tracking
✅ Customer Verification System
✅ Review Editing Capabilities
✅ Admin Chat Access Management
✅ Email Verification (Registration, Password Reset, Order Status)
✅ Provider & Customer Statistics
✅ Advanced Order Status Tracking
✅ Complete data table functionality
✅ Auto-extraction of verification codes and tokens
